title: Freelancer
description_1: Training working professionals in data sciene and bioinformatics field
description_2: Creating pipe lines to perform post-GWAS approaches

title: Postdoctoral Fellow
description_1: Conducted large-scale cross-disorder GWAS using iPSYCH samples to investigate shared genetic architecture between ASD and depression.
description_2: Developed and optimized bioinformatics pipelines for GWAS, functional annotation, heritability estimation, genetic correlation and polygenic risk score analyses
description_3: Mentored medical students in medical genetics through study cafe sessions.

title: Associate Product Manager (Faculty)
description_1: Trained professionals in data science, machine learning, and bioinformatics, teaching Python, R, statistics, EDA, Plotly DASH, Git, and GitHub.
description_2: Developed curriculum, projects, and assessments, integrating real-world datasets.
description_3: Conducted live coding sessions and hands-on workshops, mentoring students in statistical and computational techniques.

title: Research Scientist
description_1: Applied computational approaches to assess the functional relevance of disease-associated genetic markers in cervical cancer and rheumatoid arthritis.
description_2: Supervised medical research theses, focusing on statistical analysis in clinical studies.
description_3: Taught Bioinformatics, Immunology, Genetics, Statistics, and R, integrating research-driven insights into education.

title: Postdoctoral Researcher
description_1: Conducted a survival GWAS on leukemia patients post blood and marrow transplantation, identifying genetic variants influencing treatment outcomes.
description_2: Led multiple projects, including MHC region GWAS, analysis of soluble ST2 levels in acute graft-versus-host disease.
description_3: Established a protocol for X chromosome to conduct survival GWAS

title: Postdoctoral Associate
description_1: Conducted functional genomics analysis of HLA region polymorphisms associated with disease susceptibility as a volunteer on OPT.
description_2: Performed both wet and dry lab research, including cell culture, RNA extraction, and gene expression analysis.
description_3: Functionally annotated ~283,000 polymorphisms in the HLA region using R, ANNOVAR, and HaploReg.

title: Graduate Assistant
description_1: Led a PhD research project investigating gender- and age-specific risk factors for childhood acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL) using a case-only study design.
description_2: Conducted genetic association studies on lung and breast cancer, focusing on the HLA region through a candidate gene approach.

title: Freelancer
description_1: Training working professionals in data sciene field
description_2: Teaching Statistics, Python, R and Machine Learning
